Articles.Content:
Getting a  freeze now playing RP0/RO - which is strange since I've been running it no problem for a while, haven't added/changed/removed any mods in a couple weeks.

Happens repetively when I reach ~160km with a ship now however.  game completely freezes and must be killed through the task manager.  

Mods installed - Basically RP0, RO, recommended mods and a few of the suggested mods + recommended mods and a couple of suggested mods.  Full list as follows

Spoiler

(Semi)Saturatable Reaction Wheels (SemiSaturatableRW 1.10.2.1)
6S Service Compartment Tubes (Service-Compartments-6S 1.3)
Active Texture Management - X86 - Aggressive (ActiveTextureManagement-x86-Aggressive 5-0)
Adjustable Landing Gear (AdjustableLandingGear v1.2.0)
Advanced Jet Engine (AdvancedJetEngine v2.6.1)
Asteroid Day (AsteroidDay 1.0.5)
Atomic Age (AtomicAge 3.2)
B9 Aerospace Procedural Parts - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 2.1)
BahamutoD Animation Modules (BDAnimationModules v0.6.2)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 0.5.0.0)
Community Tech Tree (CommunityTechTree 2.3)
Connected Living Space (ConnectedLivingSpace 1.2.0.2)
Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator 1.9.11_KSP1.0.5)
Contract Parser (ContractParser 1.0)
Contracts Window + (ContractsWindowPlus 6.1)
Custom Barn Kit (CustomBarnKit 1.1.4.0)
Deadly Reentry Continued (DeadlyReentry v7.3.1)
DMagic Orbital Science (DMagicOrbitalScience 1.2)
FASA - Frizzank's Aeronautics and Space Administration (FASA 1:5.44)
Ferram Aerospace Research (FerramAerospaceResearch 3:0.15.5.7)
Firespitter Core (FirespitterCore v7.1.5)
Firespitter Resources config (FirespitterResourcesConfig v7.1.5)
GPOSpeedFuelPump (Goodspeed v1.6)
Hangar Extender (HangarExtender 1:v3.4.6)
Interstellar Fuel Switch Core (InterstellarFuelSwitch-Core 1.18)
Kerbal Alarm Clock (KerbalAlarmClock v3.5.0.0)
Kerbal Attachment System (KAS 0.5.5)
Kerbal Construction Time (KerbalConstructionTime 1.3.2)
Kerbal Joint Reinforcement (KerbalJointReinforcement v3.1.4)
Kerbal Renamer (KerbalRenamer 0.5)
Klockheed Martian General Plugin Functions - Gimbal module (KlockheedMartian-Gimbal 3.0.7.0)
Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier (Kopernicus 1:beta-06-3)
KSC Building Shortcuts (KSCBuildingShortcuts 1.0)
KSC Switcher (KSCSwitcher 0.5)
KSP AVC (KSP-AVC 1.1.5.0)
KW Rocketry (KWRocketry 2.7.0-community)
KW Rocketry - Community Fixes (KWRocketry-CommunityFixes 0.4.10)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.5.6.0)
Minimum Ambient Lighting (MinAmbience 1.1.1)
ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.1.2.0)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 2.6.20)
PersistentRotation (PersistentRotation 1.0.2)
Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings v3.15)
Procedural Fairings - For Everything! (ProceduralFairings-ForEverything v0.1.1)
Procedural Parts (ProceduralParts v1.1.11)
Procedural Wings (ProceduralDynamics 0.10.1)
Progress Parser (ProgressParser 2.0)
RCS Build Aid (RCSBuildAid 0.7.7)
Real Fuels (RealFuels rf-v10.8.5)
Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v10.4.10)
Real Solar System (RealSolarSystem v10.6.2)
Real Solar System Textures - 2048 x 1024 (RSSTextures2048 v10.4)
RealChute Parachute Systems (RealChute 1.3.2.7)
RealHeat (RealHeat v3)
Realism Overhaul (RealismOverhaul v10.9.6)
Realistic Progression Zero (RP-0 v0.47)
Reflection Plugin for KSP (ReflectionPlugin 1.2)
RemoteTech (RemoteTech v1.6.9)
RLA Stockalike (RLA-Stockalike 13.3)
SCANsat (SCANsat v14.9)
ShipManifest (ShipManifest 5.0.1.0)
SmokeScreen - Extended FX Plugin (SmokeScreen 2.6.13.0)
Solver Engines plugin (SolverEngines v1.15)
StageRecovery (StageRecovery 1.6.3)
Stock Extension (SXT v24)
TAC Life Support (TACLS) (TACLS v0.11.2)
TAC Life Support (TACLS) - Realism Overhaul Config (TACLS-Config-RealismOverhaul v10.9.6)
Taerobee - Stockalike X-1 & More (Taerobee 2.3)
TextureReplacer (TextureReplacer v2.4.12)
Thermometer (Thermometer 1.1.0)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1.7.10)
TriggerAu Flags (TriggerAu-Flags v2.7.4.0)
TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (TweakScale v2.2.6)
Universal Storage (UniversalStorage 1.1.0.10)
US Probes Pack (RN-USProbesPack v0.47)
US Rockets (RN-USRockets v0.3)
Ven's Stock Part Revamp (VenStockRevamp v1.9.1)
Wider Contracts App (WiderContractsApp 1.2.1)
 

I've tried going back to previous saves with no luck.

output_log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3pgmjeyabww36e4/output_log.txt?dl=0
Any idea what this might be?  It's odd that it happens at pretty much exactly 166km each time.

Don't see anything obvious, sorry.

@stratochief66 any ideas?

I can't read output_log-ese, so @Maxsimal would have to describe the install more for me to know what s/he has. The log shows AVC data for a bunch of mods reporting KSP_VERSION: 1.1 , possibly something got updated using AVC that caused some borking.

 

I know that altitude is the default RSS PQS/SS altitude, as I was just changing that down to my tight transition for my 1.1 work.

https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealSolarSystem/blob/master/GameData/RealSolarSystem/RSSKopernicus/Earth/Earth.cfg#L270

 

Could be memory limitations, or an error with how something works/displays once SS is in effect?

@stratochief66 I have all mods listed w/version #'s in that spoiler, I know some of them got bumped up to 1.1 a while ago, but I hadn't changed my install for a while before it stopped working, especially since I knew mods might be moving to 1.1 and break stuff in 1.05 - and I thought AVC didn't do autoupdates, just prompted you when things are out of date - but yeah looked at Ckan, a LOT more of my mods are on 1.1 than they used to be, so I guess if AVC is silently updating things, that's probably it.

Is there anything outside of KSP that might cause issues?  Only thing I can think of is that I installed a couple of android emulators about the time this issue started cropping up, gonna see if killing them and other processes might fix this.

Update: Killing other processes didn't work.  However, facing the camera completely away from Earth did let me get to 260k km instead.

Watching the task manager while the freeze occurs, I go from 2.9GB upsed to 3.325 GB as soon as it happens, but memory was fine up until then.

Edited April 24, 2016 by Maxsimal

RIght, sorry, I was tired at the time of my previous comment. What I mean is that you didn't tell us which version of KSP you had, whether you're doing x32 or x64, -force-d3d11 or -force-opengl, and what memory range you were running in (which you've done now)

 

Yeah, I would thing it is either mods updating themselves and breaking things (I can't confirm that with any strength, I never use AVC of any kind) or high memory usage on scene change (PQS/SS changeover here). I would suggest pruning or entirely removing a few parts heavy mods like US Rockets, US Probes, KW, or FASA to test. Finding a change that makes it stop breaking is what is important, than you can regroup to figure out why X Y or Z started causing issues.

Edited April 24, 2016 by stratochief66

@stratochief66  No worries.  Removing KW rocketry fixed it - even though it didn't reduce my memory footprint when I was launching, oddly (still at 2.9gb and change).  I was surprised it was a memory issue - thought those usually caused crashes, not freezes.

Anyway, thank you for the help, glad I can get back to my game

58 minutes ago, Maxsimal said:

@stratochief66  No worries.  Removing KW rocketry fixed it - even though it didn't reduce my memory footprint when I was launching, oddly (still at 2.9gb and change).  I was surprised it was a memory issue - thought those usually caused crashes, not freezes.

Anyway, thank you for the help, glad I can get back to my game

 

Agreed. Usually memory issues just go straight to crash. Thanks for trying the idea even when it didn't seem to be a likely solution.

@stratochief66This bug is back, even with kw still uninstalled - is there anything that could progressively eat more and more KSP memory, just from playing a long game?  I don't have a lot of ships in orbit, and deleted a few satelites I didn't need.  Only thing I see in my save file that's getting long is the list of contracts completed.

37 minutes ago, Maxsimal said:

@stratochief66This bug is back, even with kw still uninstalled - is there anything that could progressively eat more and more KSP memory, just from playing a long game?  I don't have a lot of ships in orbit, and deleted a few satelites I didn't need.  Only thing I see in my save file that's getting long is the list of contracts completed.

 

Yes. memory leaks occur at every scene change. With my fanciest 1.0.5 install (highest starting memory usage) I can play through 2-4 flights before needing a restart (or earning a crash). Make your install start using less memory, and you have more overhead before the leaks eat your remaining memory.

@stratochief66 No I meant, over time as you get deeper into the game.  With this particular issue, it always happens when I hit some particular altitude, and will always happen on the first flight after I start my game, when it's occuring.  I'm familiar with the memory leak issue, but that one does cause a crash, not this freeze.  I wonder if it has anything to do with texture issues - texture resolution changes occuring when I get far enough from Earth is the only thing I can think of.  I have the smallest size RO textures installed though.

Well, here's hoping RO gets to 1.1 soon 

Update: I removed FASA, which was the chunkiest mod I was using, and it didn't address the problem.  

Edited May 5, 2016 by Maxsimal
